attributes.action: 18 to be the minimum age for Smoking
attributes.additional_details:
Right now in the UK there is not minimum age to smoke.
Why is this?
Why do we not have a minimum age?

Everyday I see people smoking that are certainly under the age of 16, I am seeing people smoking at 13 years old.
This is not right, they don't understand the consequences.

So a minimum age should be introduced and that minimum age should be atleast 18.

rejection.details: See: Increase the Age Restriction On Smoking
